item.title: By: Tobias
item.dc:creator: Tobias
item.description:
Hey Aaron,
thanks for the review! You can easily go to your dashboard without login if you add the username and password to your URL like so:
https://your-IP-or-DNSname/dashboard.htm?username=myuser&password=mypassword
You can use the passhash instead of the password as well! username=myuser&passhash=hash
Regards!
item.content:encoded:
Hey Aaron,

thanks for the review!
You can easily go to your dashboard without login if you add the username and password to your URL like so:

https://your-IP-or-DNSname/dashboard.htm?username=myuser&password=mypassword

You can use the passhash instead of the password as well!
username=myuser&passhash=hash

Regards!
